name: Injinji Liner + Runner Mini-Crew Coolmax Socks - Unisex
description: Blister-proof your setup for long training or racing days. This two-sock system has a toesock liner that moves moisture off your foot, allows toes to splay and prevents toe-on-toe friction that can cause blisters. The outer sock is provides cushioning and breathability.Liner is 63% CoolMax® with nylon and Lycra to wicks moisture and helps prevent blisters.Outer sock is 33% CoolMax polyester.Mesh top provides breathability and ventilation.Outer sock has built-in arch support.Anatomical right and left foot design enhances fit.
